DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Screening Counselling Elderly With Psychological Problems
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : The aim study test screening follow brief problem-solving counselling primary care doctor improve health-related quality life ( HRQOL ) elderly patient previously undiagnosed psychological problem . It also find effect undiagnosed psychological problem HRQOL consultation rate elderly patient . Design , Setting & Subjects : This prospective single-blinded randomise control trial 450 patient age 60 attend Government General Outpatient Clinic Hong Kong , screen psychological problem . Methods : Elderly patient attend General Outpatient Department Ap Lei Chau Clinic know diagnosis psychological problem Hospital Anxiety & Depression Scale ( HADS ) screen order recruit 300 subject screen positive undiagnosed psychological problem randomise counsel no-counselling group , 150 subject screen negative psychological problem select normal control Interventions : The counsel group receive brief problem-solving counselling train primary care doctor addition usual medical care ; no-counselling group receive general health education usual medical care ; normal control group continue usual care . Main Outcome Measures : Health-related quality life measure SF-36 , HADS score consultation rate . The baseline change outcomes three group compare 0 , 6 , 12 , 36 52 week screen . Conclusions : The result provide evidence whether screen follow brief problem-solving counselling primary care effective improving quality life reduce consultation rate elderly undiagnosed psychological problem .
